pullRequest.title: DEV-1245 Create a JSON sample source
pullRequest.bodyText:
Create a new class JsonSampleSource which parses a JSON representation of the sample/lane/fastq model, passing the GCS locations along as paths within the lanes. This combined with the GS upload allows us to put fastq files in arbitrary locations.
Eliminated the file system upload as its no longer used (local runs should use this new way, or the acc api).
Also eliminated the patient module and some interfaces which didn't really add any value. Included in this commit as it made the addition of the JsonSampleSource more straightforward.

commit.message:
DEV-1245 Create a JSON sample source

Create a new class JsonSampleSource which parses a JSON representation of the sample/lane/fastq model,
passing the GCS locations along as paths within the lanes. This combined with the GS upload allows us
to put fastq files in arbitrary locations.

Eliminated the file system upload as its no longer used (local runs should use this new way, or the acc
api).

Also eliminated the patient module and some interfaces which didn't really add any value. Included in this
commit as it made the addition of the JsonSampleSource more straightforward.

nodes.bodyText: Could we come up with a name that is more descriptive of its function rather than just indicative of its file format? Like maybe sample_json or something?
We're going to need to make a "not applicable" constant somewhere central...

commit.message:
DEV-1245 Set type based on if not set explicitly

This code was accidentally removed.

DEV-1245 Remove type from sample altogether

As this field is no longer read (the type is decided via other metadata), best just to remove it
and simplify the JSON representation and remove all name based heuristics.
DEV-1245 Rename field to sample json as per review comments.
